effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.platinum: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
flavor_text.platinum: The user slugs the foe with a shattering punch. It can also smash cracked boulders.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user hits with a punch that may lower the target’s Defense. It can also smash cracked boulders.
